data.headline: Data Scientist | Self-Taught Developer
data.summary: Versatile data scientist with a passion for leveraging data-driven insights to drive business impact. Proficient in a range of analytics tools and techniques, with a proven track record of delivering innovative solutions to complex problems.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.paragraph: Played a key role in developing and implementing data-driven solutions to address complex business challenges. Leveraged a range of analytical techniques, including machine learning, to uncover valuable insights and drive data-informed decision-making. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into actionable data strategies, resulting in significant improvements in operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Junior Data Analyst
experience.paragraph: Responsible for collecting, processing, and analyzing data from various sources to support business decision-making. Developed custom dashboards and reports using Tableau and Power BI, enabling stakeholders to access and interpret data more effectively. Contributed to the implementation of data governance frameworks and data quality assurance processes, ensuring the integrity and reliability of the organization's data assets.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.paragraph: Gained hands-on experience in the field of data science by supporting various startup projects. Collaborated with founders and entrepreneurs to identify data-driven solutions to their business challenges, leveraging my skills in data analysis, predictive modeling, and data visualization. Contributed to the development of prototypes and proof-of-concept projects, showcasing the value of data-driven decision-making.

experience.title: Data Consultant
experience.paragraph: Provided data consulting services to a diverse range of clients, including small businesses and startups. Assisted in the implementation of data management strategies, the development of custom analytics solutions, and the training of client teams on data-driven best practices. Demonstrated the ability to work independently, adapt to varying client needs, and deliver high-quality results within tight deadlines.

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance Model
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict equipment failures in a manufacturing plant, resulting in a 20% reduction in unplanned downtime.

projects.name: Customer Churn Analysis
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of customer churn patterns, identifying key drivers and implementing targeted retention strategies that improved customer retention by 15%.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Alejandro Gutiérrez, a mid-career data scientist with a self-taught background, looking directly at the camera with a friendly, confident expression.
